root.name: Disgaea 3: Absence of Detention
root.description: Enhanced port of Disgaea 3: Absence of Justice.New FeaturesThe ability to use Tera level magic.There are now animated character portraits in cutscenes.Every piece of DLC that was released for the PS3 version bundled in.New unique attacks for generic characters.Generic characters can have different personality types like in Disgaea 4.Options that take advantage of the Vita's Touch Screen and Rear Touch Pad.The Record Shop has been added so you buy new background music.Two brand new playable characters: Rutile and Stella Grossular.Monster classes can equip 2 additional Evilities instead of one.Characters talk when they leave the Base Panel like in Disgaea 4.Sir Pri, the Class World Prinny, is always in the main area.Fuka and Desco from Disgaea 4: A Promise Unforgotten can be unlocked as playable characters.4 New Story Scenarios, each starring different characters (one for Almaz and Sapphire, one for Master Big Star and Salvatore, one for Kyoko and Asuka and one introducing the two new characters Rutile and Stella).The ability to put Unique Characters (post-game characters and DLC characters) into the Detention Room.Rank 41 Weapons have been added which include the Stardust Sword and Ancient Spear.
